replace_string.title: Replace string
replace_string.description: Set the string that should be replaced for a dot (".") in all column names that contain the replace. e.g. with replace string set to __ the column contact__address will be sent to salesforce as contact.address.

upsert_field_name.title: External ID
upsert_field_name.description: Specify which column in the input table is an External ID for the upsert operation. Values in the External ID column must be unique. More information on importing with External IDs can be found in Salesforce documentation.

assignment_id.title: Assignment Id
assignment_id.description: ID of Lead Assignment rule you want to run after import. See how to find it.

fail_on_error.title: Fail on error
fail_on_error.description: When checked, the component job will fail if any error occurs. If unchecked, the component will be successful if some errors occur.
